price: 187. Haz que se desplome un pedazo de cielo sobre nosotros, si eres de los veraces”.
arabic: فَأَسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-asqiṭ ʿalaynā kisafan mina al-samāi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
